Sentencas: Al2O3-glass composite seals are fabricated by tape casting Al2O3 and HGS glass powder mixtures with glass contents ranging from 20 to 60 wt%.
Titulo: Optimization of Al2O3-glass composite seals for planar intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Their leaking performance is evaluated for various temperatures, gas pressures and compressive loads.
Titulo: Optimization of Al2O3-glass composite seals for planar intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The seal with optimized glass content is subjected to thermal cycling and single-cell tests to investigate the viability of the seal.
Titulo: Optimization of Al2O3-glass composite seals for planar intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The sealing performance of the seal is significantly improved by increasing the glass content in the composite seal: the seal containing 50 wt% glass (AG50) shows the best sealing performance among the studied compositions.
Titulo: Optimization of Al2O3-glass composite seals for planar intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Increasing the testing gas pressure or decreasing the testing temperature and compressive load increase the leak rate of the seal.
Titulo: Optimization of Al2O3-glass composite seals for planar intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: After 25 thermal cycles between 750 and 200 degrees C, the leak rate of the AG50 seal is still below 0.021 sccm cm(-1) under the conditions of 750 degrees C, a compressive load of 0.12 MPa and a testing gas pressure of 3.5 kPa to 10.5 kPa.
Titulo: Optimization of Al2O3-glass composite seals for planar intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Using the AG50 seal, a high open circuit voltage of above 1.16 V after 6 thermal cycles is achieved for a 10 x 10 cm(2) anode-supported single cell (active area of 9 x 9 cm(2)), which demonstrates the applicability of the AG50 seal in practical SOFC operations.
Titulo: Optimization of Al2O3-glass composite seals for planar intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells
Optimization of Al2O3-glass composite seals for planar intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells
Optimization of Al2O3-glass composite seals for planar intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells
